胈字的基本解释

胈
bá
肌肉（一说细毛）：“尧舜于是乎股无胈，胫无毛。”
洁白的肉。

胈字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bá］
［《廣韻》蒲撥切，入末，並。］
(1)人身上的细毛。
(2)古代传说中称人类的祖先。
(3)脖子。

胈字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【肉字部】　胈； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页977第15
【廣韻】【集韻】【正韻】?蒲撥切，音跋。【廣韻】股上小毛也。【韻會】膚毳皮。【前漢·司馬相如傳】躬傶骿胝無胈。【註】胈，毳膚皮也。言禹勤，骿胝無有毳毛也。【司馬相如·難蜀父老文韋昭註】身中小毛。【莊子·天下篇】禹親自操橐耜，而九雜天下之川，腓無胈，脛無毛。　又【集韻】蒲蓋切，音旆。義同。　又白肉也。【史記·司馬相如傳】躬胝無胈。【註】胈，白肉也。

胈字的起名意思

暂无。

Claw
Basic explanation of words
Claw
bá
Muscles (in other words, fine hair): "So Yao and Shun almost had no girdle on his thighs and no hair on his shins."
White meat.
Claw
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bá］
["Guang Yun" Pu Bo cut, enter the end, and merge. ]
(1) The fine hair on the human body.
(2) In ancient legends, it is called the ancestor of human beings.
(3) Neck.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set next] [Department of meat characters] 　胈; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: Page 977 15
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Pu Piao cut, sound postscript. [Guang Yun] Xiao Mao is also on the stock. 【Rhyme】Skin and velvet skin. 【Previous Han·Sima Xiangru Biography】Gong Zhang has no calluses. 【Note】Chin, velvet skin also. Yan Yuqin, there is no vellus hair. [Note by Sima Xiangru·Nanshu Father Wen Wei Zhao] Small hair in the body. [Zhuangzi·Tianxia Chapter] Yu personally handles the scorpion, and the nine-mixed river in the world has no calves and no hairs on the shin.　[Jiyun] Pu Gaiqie, the sound is young. The same meaning.　It's white meat. [Historical Records · Sima Xiangru Biography] Nothing is wrong. [Note] You are also white meat.
